name: Across the servers (Falcon Nova, Dogtopius)
description:
Made for Metroidvania Month 11.

As of now, game ends after obtaining the dash.

Story

In the year 2XXX, technology has made so many advancements that humanity almost entirely rely on it. Countries of the world have access to it, and all servers are interconnected. Threats on the outside have almost disappeared, but this leads to other threats...

viruses.

Anya, hacker and professionnal gamer, has been tasked with eradicating the worst computer virus known to man: Defrag. Help her travel the world through the Internet and reduce Defrag to bits!

Controls

Controls are explained in-game, but in case:

You can toggle keyboard and controller controls on the title screen. Both can be used at the same time, but you'll have to use only one for an upgrade. Set on controller by default. Controller is highly recommended.

Controller (Xbox)Keyboard & MouseMoveD-PadA/W
JumpASpaceInteractYQMelee attackXLeft mouse buttonRanged attack (upgrade)Left joystick (aim) + XRight mouse buttonDash (upgrade)Left buttonShiftMapSelectE Credits

All story, concept, design, art,sounds and code was made by Falcon Nova. Dogtopius made the music.
